article_title: HCA's Urgent Care Buying Binge Pays Off

article_metadata.description: The giant hospital operator HCA Holdings said urgent care visits soared to more than 1 million in the last year as the company intensifies its focus on a booming and consumer-friendly segment of the healthcare industry. HCA, rival Tenet Healthcare and the Optum unit of UnitedHealth Group are among the major [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
